name: Danish Modern Teak “Barrel” Lounge Chairs by Finn Andersen for Selig

condition.details: Reupholstered. Refinished. Professionally Refinished and Reupholstered. The chairs feature new high-quality fabric and HD foam.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: A beautiful pair of Danish modern lounge chairs, designed by Finn Andersen for Selig in the 1960s. These chairs showcase a striking barrel-shaped design that not only captures the essence of mid-century style but also highlights the exquisite craftsmanship involved in their construction. The solid teak frames provide a warm, rich finish that complements the elegant silhouette. These chairs have been professionally reupholstered in a luxurious beige boucle fabric, enhancing their aesthetic appeal while providing comfort and durability. Complete with all-new HD foam, they offer an inviting seating experience that balances style and functionality. Each chair proudly displays the original Selig medallion, a testament to its authenticity and quality. Perfect for any modern interior, these lounge chairs are a beautiful blend of design, comfort, and historical significance, making them a must-have for collectors and design enthusiasts alike. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- When you purchase vintage furniture from us, you're not just acquiring a unique piece; you're also gaining access to our expert restoration services. Each item we sell comes with the peace of mind that it has been meticulously restored by our skilled team, leveraging over a decade of experience in vintage furniture renovation. We take the hassle out of the restoration process for you. From expertly sanding the old finish to highlight the natural grain of the wood to reupholstering sofas with new foam and fabric while maintaining their original charm—every detail is thoughtfully addressed. This means you can enjoy your newly acquired vintage piece without worrying about any of the labor-intensive work that typically comes with restoration. With us, you’re making an investment in both style and peace of mind as we handle all the hard work so you can simply enjoy your unique find.
